analysis.Overall Analysis: The candidate's resume highlights relevant technical skills in Java and Spring Boot, which are useful for backend development tasks. However, the resume lacks emphasis on skills specific to CV writing, editing, and industry-specific keyword research. The applicant's projects show strong engineering skills, but there is no direct experience with CV creation or management, which is a key requirement for the CV Intern role. Nevertheless, the candidate demonstrates strong problem-solving abilities, good communication skills, and an ability to work in team environments.

Relevant Projects.Title: CarCaddy - Car Rental Automation System
Relevant Projects.Tools: Spring Boot, MySQL, Hibernate, REST APIs, Maven
Relevant Projects.Description: Developed a scalable car rental management system using Spring Boot, MySQL, and Hibernate ORM. Integrated backend validation, designed optimized database schemas, and developed RESTful APIs for user authentication and system management. Implemented efficient error handling and debugging techniques across the system to ensure robustness.

Relevant Projects.Title: Delivery Route Optimization
Relevant Projects.Description: Modified an algorithm to optimize delivery routes, minimizing travel distance and costs for multi-parcel deliveries. Applied advanced problem-solving techniques to achieve a more efficient and streamlined delivery process. Collaborated effectively with a team, demonstrating strong teamwork and communication skills.

Relevant Projects.Title: Medical Management System
Relevant Projects.Description: Streamlined inventory and sales management, improving the accuracy of tracking medicine details.
